Text: Both this and the Morbius scan, while real, are terrible quality, and nearly unreadable. Just wait till next week.
Scan is fine, it's certainly readable. Good if you can't wait.
i wonder just *how* pissed Marvel is that the scanbro guy (or gal) keeps scanning books that are unreleased?!?
meh!  too poor in quality for these tired ol' eyes.
